reviews.review: Галимое дерьмо, пули не регает, но играть можно
Comunidade toxica, faz mal pro coração, depois de começar a jogar é preciso tomar um " Gardenal ".

have fun with the worst matchmaking in history. 
Most of your games you will play vs enemies which are 3 or 4 ranks above you. 
And if you are lucky and get the same ranks as you, they are most of the time hackers
Once you manage to ignore your brain damaged teammates, this game is 10/10, before that good luck, possible mental breakdown :)
excellent brings me back to cs once again
Very nice game but to many hackers

МНЕ ПОНРАВИЛОСЬ ОЩУЩЕНИЕ ЧЛЕНА ВО РТУ! ЛЮБЛЮ КОГДА ГОВОРИШЬ ТИМЕЙТАМ ИДТИ НА "Б", А ТЕБЕ КОНЧАЮТ В ЖЁПУ И ИДУТ ПУШИТЬ МИДДЭЛ. МНЕ ОЧЕНЬ НАРВИТСЯ ТАКАЯ ИГРА! РЕКОМЕНДУЮ ОЩУТИТЬ ТЁПЛУЮ СПЕРМУ НА СТЕНКАХ ЖЁПЫ!

Depending on this CRITERIA EVERYONE SHOULD READ THIS : 

1.Are you emotionally strong and emotionally pain tolerance?
2.Can you handle toxicity at its finest? 
3.Can you stand people shit talking you that they f*ck your mom everyday?
4.Are you suicidal? ( pls don't if you are , you can thank me later for years to come ) 
5.You wanna see how humanity in its natural habitat? Here you got everything. But without a cage or emotional support. But can you cope with playing with them for at least 1 hour? 
6.Do you want to come back home after work just to get told you are useless? 
7.Are you secretly masochist? 
8.Are you white knight? ( Theres no simp and white knight here in csgo just pure cruelty )

If your answer got 6 out of 8 then go ahead and do what i would do. If not you can find better game than csgo tbh. Save yourself from the cruelty and hideousness of humanity without emotion.
